dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 9213 IH: To amend title 54, United States Code, to authorize the appropriation of $10,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2023 and 2024 to the Secretary of the Interior to carry out the National Maritime Heritage Grant Program.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Higgins of New York (for himself and Ms. Malliotakis) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend title 54, United States Code, to authorize the appropriation of $10,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2023 and 2024 to the Secretary of the Interior to carry out the National Maritime Heritage Grant Program.

section.header: Authorization of appropriations for the National Maritime Heritage Grant Program
section.text: Section 308703 of title 54, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in subsection (b)(1), by inserting subsection (k) and after amounts for that purpose under;
in subsection (c)(1), by inserting subsection (k) and after amounts for that purpose under; and
by adding at the end the following:

subsection.text: There are hereby authorized to be appropriated to the Secretary $10,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2023 and 2024 to carry out this section.
